column4: i'm downloading a whole bunch of updates this morning and noticing that speeds are slow, presumably the repositories are under a big load. just wondering if people have considered a kind of bittorrent system to get updates, which would then fall back to the main server if it failed...?
i'm just thinking that battlenet does something like that, i think
hmmm, ok. was just a thought!
then you would have to manually install them or write a script to do it, plus then all the security problems that would result.  Best to just wait a bit and dl updates during different odd hours
